channel.title: Runite - Village Pk Dev. Team
channel.description:
[img]http://s8.createphpbb.com/phpbb/banners/runitevillage.gif[/img]
[size=20pt]Accepting Again - We can not accept forums dev. [/size]
Welcome to my Runite - Village PK Development Topic. In this Topic I will explain the following:
[b] We Now Have Forums That will Be Sent Through Pm[/b]
[b] [ul][li] My Ideas and Thoughts [/li][/ul]
[b] [ul][li] Things I have already taken into consideration[/li][/ul]
[b] [ul][li] The Client Work[/li][/ul]
[b] [ul][li] The Server side work[/li][/ul]
[b] [ul][li] The Accepted Crew[/li][/ul]
[b] [ul][li] My Ideas and Thoughts[/li][/ul]
I am thinking about making the server into a big pking server reasoning behind this is because RuneScapes Pking is gone and people have cravings to kill other players but still have a large community. Thats why I want a stable source or a very trusted Host that can prove they can hold 80+ Players. If we don't have anyone then I am hoping we can get a great base server that can alone hold 60 - 120 players. My internet is strong but when the limit has been met I lose all connection to the internet. Thats where my Community thought ends.
I want to make it based on a Runescape classic armour everyone always enjoyed which of course was Rune armour for soo long. We will still have barrows and all but there will be the set that stands out the most... Rune Whip, Rune Defender, Rune Boots, Rune P hat, Rune Plate, Rune Plate Legs, just think of that set. I got those items covered.
My most enormous Ideas are where I am taking place now. I want to make a defense system.. One Like RuneScape that actually takes awhile to die when your hit in Dharok or Bandos. Dueling could fall into place there with tank stakers. The last piece to this ideal is a one versus one pking spot.
[b] [ul][li] Things I have taken into Consideration[/li][/ul]
I have taken into consideration of only having one kind of party hat available. Party hat type: Runite It will have: 13+ Strength Bonus, 20+ Defense bonus in everything else but magic. It will have -20 Magic Defense and Attack. I have also thought about 7 Dark Bow that is dropped from Dark Beast (Bad at editing NPCS I need help here) Dark Bows Max can be Special like 35/35 and regular about 20/20.. We'll see. I have not though much into armours and newer weapons yet but I know I'm adding full Bandos, we will add a special and all. We will have Vengence in the server. At least working good enough to impress a Pker. There we are in Considering Ideals.
[ul][li] 100% Happening Client Work[/li][/ul]
In our client work section, We will be using a client that has some things in it already so we can get to the server sooner. Our client base could be anything atm I'm not sure which is best.. Our Goal will be to add Vengence, All Combat Capes fully colored correctly and 3 + Bonus in the skill that has a 99. We want at least 4 new NPCS to become better than bad. We will have items added by me such as runeite whip, Phat Custom Items and ect.
[b] [ul][li] 100% Happening Server Side Work[/li][/ul]
[b] [ul][li] On the top of the list I really wanna add vengence but I don't exactly know how yet. [b][list][li] Spiecal for GodSword[/li][/list] [b][list][li] Dueling(harder but I hope we get it.)[/li][/list] [b][list][li] Bonuses Similar to RuneScape[/li][/list] [b][list][li] NPCs working Attack, Defend, Dieing Emotes[/li][/list] [b][list][li] Full Dharok Effect[/li][/list] [b][list][li] Full Pest Control[/li][/list] [b][list][li] Full Prayer (If Possible)[/li][/list] [b][list][li] Full Barrows[/li][/list] [b][list][li] Full Fishing[/li][/list] [b][list][li] Basic RuneCrafting (2 Runes per click would be fast enough I think..)[/li][/list]
[b][list][li] Accepted Applicants, we no longer accept forums dev.:[/li][/list]
[b][list][li] DD - Client Side[/li][/list] [b][list][li] Ill Pk ur as - Server Side[/li][/list] [b][list][li] [/li][/list] [b][list][li] [/li][/list] [b][list][li] [/li][/list]
All Credits in the end will be given not as percents but as a team. We will be respectful. See someone you don't like here? Just don't communicate with them or don't apply.
Application Format: Code:
[b]What Occupation do you wish to Program in?:[/b] [b]What is your experience in Programming the occupation you have chosen?:[/b] [b]Will you get your job done when assigned?:[/b] [b]Do you have proof of your skills?(This is not required only suggested!):[/b]
We will have breaks that can last weekends or weeks to relax! So do not worry about Christmas or any religious holiday you celibrate! You will be excused from those days 100%!
I hope you all get good acceptable Applications.
Open Spots are as listed: [Server Side] [Client Side] [Forums] [Anything Else You Think We Might Need, Not 100% That You'll Be Accepted Though....]
If you are Listed in the accepted names I will Personal Message you (PM) and I will send you my MSN Contact. or you can send yours.[/ul]

item.title: Runite - Village Pk Dev. Team
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

[quote=“Not Pwnd, post:52, topic:165300”]Man if I could program I’d so help. I’d love to offer you ideas though!

1- Every personal kill you do, gives you a certain type of currency (rocks, special coins, gems whatever) and once you get a certain amount you can buy the special barrows gear. This will cause players to be on continually farming for the currency they need for their good gear.

2- Don’t force the player to lose items on death. That made me want to quit runescape at the THOUGHT of being able to lose items from dying.[/quote]
He hasn’t logged in since April 18th.

Read full topic

What Occupation do you wish to Program in?: JAVA

Will you get your job done when assigned?: Yes, I will get the job done when ever I am assigned one.
Do you have proof of your skills?(This is not required only suggested!): Well I’ve coded 3 servers of my own. I’ve helped code 2 servers. I’m pretty good with java all around and I like to do it. I love when I can’t figure something out and then finally get it I think java is a extremly fun puzzle to do and I like learning about it because most people dont even know about it. Love to have that extra knowledge some people lack. No offence to anyone

I hope to join, If not oh well. :p[/quote]

Atm we are having trouble lol, but add John_95_07@hotmail.com if you can help us out then your good to go and will be accepted.
